message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and high demand, I'm asking for $20,000.  I'm confident you'll find this a fair price.
Alice, thanks for the offer. While I appreciate the product, $20,000 is above my budget.  I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to come down to $17,000. This is my final offer.
Alice, I understand your position, but $17,000 is still outside my budget. I'm willing to go up to $12,000. This is a fair price considering the value I place on the product.
